{{cpp/chrono/year_month/title|year_month}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
year_month() = default;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr year_month( const std::chrono::year&amp; y, 
                      const std::chrono::month&amp; m ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs a {{tt|year_month}} object.

@1@ Default constructor leaves the year and month uninitialized.
@2@ Constructs a {{tt|year_month}} object storing the year {{c|y}} and the month {{c|m}}.

===Notes===
A more convenient way to construct a {{tt|year_month}} is with {{c|operator/}}, e.g., {{c|2007y/std::chrono::April}}.
